ip_list.comment: list of controller IP addresses (cntrl 1 to 4)

bind_list.comment: list of network ip address to bind controller connections

port_list.comment: list of network ports to bind controller connections

data_path.comment: the path location for images and data

conf_path.comment: the path location for config files

acf_list.comment: the list of Archon config files (i.e. timing code)

map_list.comment: the list of ccd map files

exptime.comment: the image exposure time in sec

init_count.comment: initial count of exposures already acquired

num_exp.comment: the number of exposures to take

log_level.comment: the logging level(INFO, WARN, DEBUG, or ERROR)

image_prefix.comment: the prefix for each image name

leader.comment: the name of the lead controller

flush_time.comment: the time to initially flush the CCDs by continuously reading out

power_down.comment: power down on exit True or False
